original: rje btsun sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rje btsun sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: lam du 'gro ba la chom rkun mi 'ong bar bya ba'i phyir them pa nas gom pa bdun gzhal pa'i sa nas lag pa g-yas pas sa sbar ba gang blangs la /
analyzed: lam du 'gro ba la chom rkun mi 'ong bar bya ba'i phyir them pa nas gom pa bdun gzhal pa'i sa nas lag pa g-yas pas sa sbar ba gang blangs la /
translated: In order to prevent thieves from coming to those traveling on the road, take a handful of earth from the ground seven paces from the threshold.

original: de nas rang skad cig gis rje btsun mar bskyed la /
analyzed: de nas rang skad cig gis rje btsun mar bskyed la /
translated: Then, instantly generate yourself as Venerable Tārā.

original: skyabs 'gro dang sems bskyed tshul bzhin du byas la /
analyzed: skyabs 'gro dang sems bskyed tshul bzhin du byas la /
translated: Properly go for refuge and generate the awakening mind.

original: lag pa g-yas pa'i sa de lam las ri rab tsam du bskyed de /
analyzed: lag pa g-yas pa'i sa de lam las ri rab tsam du bskyed de /
translated: From the earth in your right hand, generate a mountain like Mount Meru.

original: lag pa g-yon du bam las rgya mtsho chen por bskyed la /
analyzed: lag pa g-yon du bam las rgya mtsho chen por bskyed la /
translated: In your left hand, generate an ocean from vaṃ.

original: dmigs pa de ring bdag la gnod par byed pa'i chom rkun thams cad mdun du bkug ste /
analyzed: dmigs pa de ring bdag la gnod par byed pa'i chom rkun thams cad mdun du bkug ste /
translated: In front of you, summon all the thieves who would harm you today.

original: mi'i tshig gis bar mchod par sngags 'di brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te /
analyzed: mi'i tshig gis bar mchod par sngags 'di brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te /
translated: With human speech, recite this mantra one hundred and eight times:

original: aom t'a re tu tt'a re tu re aasma aa pa ka ra sarba tsoo r'a bandha bandha sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom t'a re tu tt'a re tu re aasma aa pa ka ra sarba tsoo r'a bandha bandha sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ tāre tuttāre ture asmapradāre sarvacoḍāvaṇḍa vaṇḍa svāhā.

original: zhes bya'o // mdun gyi chom rkun pa thams cad rgya mtsho chen por blugs la /
analyzed: zhes bya'o // mdun gyi chom rkun pa thams cad rgya mtsho chen por blugs la /
translated: Having placed all the thieves in front into the great ocean,

original: g-yas kyi sa de g-yon du spos la ri rab kyis mnan par bsam mo //
analyzed: g-yas kyi sa de g-yon du spos la ri rab kyis mnan par bsam mo //
translated: one should move the earth of the right to the left and imagine that they are suppressed by Mount Meru.

original: de nas sa de thu ba g-yon par bcings te 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i gnas su dgrol bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas sa de thu ba g-yon par bcings te 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i gnas su dgrol bar bya'o //
translated: Then, having tied up that earth in the left armpit, one should untie it in a place free from danger.

original: 'gro ba'i dus su sgrol ma'i bstod pa la sogs pa sgrogs shing 'gro'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i dus su sgrol ma'i bstod pa la sogs pa sgrogs shing 'gro'o //
translated: At the time of going, one should go reciting the praises of Tārā and so forth.

original: chom rkun bcing ba zhes bya ba'i rim pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: chom rkun bcing ba zhes bya ba'i rim pa rdzogs so /
translated: The procedure called Binding Thieves is complete.

original: // / ma h'a pandi ta shr'i ratna rakshi ta dang / lo ts'a ba zhang grub pa dpal bzang pos bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: // / ma h'a pandi ta shr'i ratna rakshi ta dang / lo ts'a ba zhang grub pa dpal bzang pos bsgyur ba'o//
translated: By the great paṇḍita Śrī Ratna Rakṣita and the translator Zhang Thubpa Pal Zangpo.
